janadhipathiwarayage upades matha puran kumbauru aswaddime wadasatahana yatathe gowithan kirimata yayi pawasamin mema kala eli karana bawath janadhipathiwarayageda nama awabhawitha karamin mema maha wana sanharaya sidu kerena bawath parisarawedihu penwa dethi.

janadhipathiwarayage pa්radhanathwayen ada perawaruwe kaluthara bo samindu abiyasa pawathwena aagamika uthsawayak, paswaru 02.00ta kolambaa bandaranayaka sammanthrana shalawedi pawathwena jathika wadasatahanak ha ratha්riye janadhipathi lekam karyalayedi sarwa rathrika pirith desumak pawathweyi.
